entry.title: How it works technically
entry.summary: We use Static site publishing technologto provide a low cost and highly secure service.
entry.content: We use Static site publishing technologto provide a low cost and highly secure service.

entry.title: FAQ
entry.summary: Frequently Asked Questions Yes, one can register in Umatibank directly and begin the process of establishing your group be it a CBO, self help group, youth group, womens group, etc. can mens groups' be registered? yesHow many youths can register in umati bank .com? Group size is ideally between 10 and 30 per group, but we are willing to make exceptions of you request a different option.how many women can register in umati bank.com? 30 per group. What are the benefits after joining?great things.
entry.content:
Frequently Asked Questions

  • How can group register a group in Umati Bank?   
  • Groups can be registered directly from our web app once we launch, we reccomend contacting Daniel Murithi directly artatheart3839@gmail.com

  • How can a group learn about group development dynamics?
  • We are developing a library of materials linked to our notifcation system 

 

  • Can a group collaborate with other stake holders?
  • the Umati Bank provides assistance for groups to draft constitutions, MOU agreements, etc. Defining their relationship relative to NGOs, private investors and government institutions.
  • Can a group register without a registration certificate?

  • Yes, one can register in Umatibank directly and begin the process of establishing your group be it a CBO, self help group, youth group, womens group, etc.  

  • can mens groups' be registered?
  •  yes
  • How many youths can register in umati bank .com?
  •  Group size is ideally between 10 and 30 per group, but we are willing to make exceptions of you request a different option.
  • how many women can register in umati bank.com?
  •  30 per group. 
  • What are the benefits after joining?
  • great things.

entry.title: How it works
entry.summary: The table banking concept that the Umati Bank provides allows small groups to direct their own funds while earning interest on their investment, while gaining access to community fund loans and small business development support from partners like Equity Bank Foundation, Sustainable Community Development Hub and Mamawatoto Self Help Group. To get started you can download our action plan document
entry.content:
The table banking concept that the Umati Bank provides allows small groups to direct their own funds while earning interest on their investment, while gaining access to community fund loans and small business development support from partners like Equity Bank Foundation, Sustainable Community Development Hub and Mamawatoto Self Help Group.

To get started you can download our action plan document

entry.title: Table Banking
entry.summary: Umati Bank provides a revolving loan fund system for communities. We are currently working with a self help group of 24 people in Njiru Kenya operating as "Art at Heart". ￼_
entry.content:
Umati Bank provides a revolving loan fund system for communities. We are currently working with a self help group of 24 people in Njiru Kenya operating as "Art at Heart".

 

 

￼_
